title: New: Andy Stott – Leaving (The Recycle Culture Uplift)
body: It’s been a great year for **[Andy Stott](https://www.facebook.com/pages/Andy-Stott/262174253793725?ref=ts&fref=ts)**, this year’s _Luxury Problems_ finally saw the Manchester producer break out of the UK/Brooklyn techno scene and into the grander musical arena. A grander musical arena that if anything coincided with a record that was as difficult, if not more so, than his past material. Focusing almost entirely on looped sounds, **Stott** delicately manipulates vocals and ‘found sound’ to ultimate exploitation. It’s the music of a paranoid and obsessive character. So perhaps It’s with half a degree fun and another half arrogance that anonymous producer **[Recycle Culture](http://recycleculture.tumblr.com/)** has reworked **Stotts** album track, _Leaving_, into a barf inducing trance tune. Let’s just say it almost, almost, works, and leave it at that.
